title: Cardano Hub - Eastern Europe
description: 東欧には多くの開発者と大きな経済的可能性がある

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is addressing to continue and develop an earlier hub in the easern european region. It addresses the challenge effectively, but instead of providing the links to the prior proposals in earlier funds, the links to documentation would be more effective in making clear how high the impact and value of this hub will be in the future.
f6_assessments.q1: Experience and prior commitment of the proposer is very relevant and implementation is highly likely since this is an ongoing initiative. However, it would have been nice if the proposer would have provided some milestones that have been reached through the earlier initiative. Budget is not broken down so it is not clear what the funds will be used for. Generally, I think this is a good project but the proposal is lacking documentation and if the proposer aims to educate and introduce people to Cardano, this proposal should reflect this as well.
f6_assessments.q2: Audatibility is low since the proposer already is committed so it would be important to be able to differentiate prior and future work on the same project. The proposer did not provide a roadmap, milestones or any goals for what he would like to accomplish, the broad ideas that are given are not followed up with by actionable steps. I would recommend for this proposer to provide more examples of what has already been accomplish and to give examples on what organizations or businesses he would try to get in touch with.

f6_assessments.q0: In problem statement being increasing awareness about Cardano in eastern Europe but proposer has given a generic idea in the proposal of building the hub, a more specific proposal would have provided the effectiveness in addressing the challenge
f6_assessments.q1: The relevant experience for this particular problem statement chosen has not been mentioned apart from previous funding round proposals and there is not much specific plan on implementation
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer haven't provided any details on fund break down or timeline so, it will be difficult to track the progress and success of proposal as there are no further attributes in proposal to choose as a measure for the same.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea in this proposal is very good. It targets developpers in Eastern Europe, which is a good niche to target. Convincing thoses developpers to develop on cardano will have great impact on the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal lacks a detailed plan, which is a essential component for a successful implementation. Besides, I don't see a precise a roadmap for this project. I suggest to the proposer add a roadmap and a detail plan.
f6_assessments.q2: For this project to be auditable, I would love to see some key metrics and a roadmap. Unfortunately, this proposals doesn't provide enough informations in this regard. I give it a 2 for auditability.

solution: 東欧のカルダノハブ（キエフにて
experience: ブロックチェーンに5年、Fund1からProject Catalystに参加し、2019年にはキエフでADAを受け入れる文学的なクリプトバーを作りました。
